entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023
